CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Referral_Account__r.Referral_Source_Business_Type__c) ,"Accounting Firm",IF( TEXT(AICPA_Enrolled__c)=="Y","Referral-CPA-AICPA","Referral-CPA-Non-AICPA") ,"Broker","Referral-Financial Advisor" ,"Broker Dealer","Referral-Financial Advisor" ,"Broker Dealer Branch","Referral-Financial Advisor" ,"Financial Services","Referral-Bank Referral" ,"Insurance Broker","Referral-Independent Ins. Agent" ,"Insurance Carrier","Referral-Independent Ins. Agent" ,"National Account","Referral - National Account HQ" ,"Strategic Account","Referral-Strategic Account" ,"Paychex Co",IF( TEXT(Referral_Account__r.ReferralSourceSubType__c)=="Advance Partners","Referral-Internal-Advance Partners","") ,"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default lead source to use on the opportunity when this is used as a referral contact
CustomField.label: Lead Source Default
